title: Longhorns Daily News : Texa Bevo turns 10 this week
body_text:
Bevo VV — the 15th edition of the Texas Longhorns mascot — turns 10 years old this week.
Longhorns Daily News: Texas’ Bevo turns 10 this week
Plus: Texas WBB beat Tennessee last night
He’s been on the job since Bevo XIV passed from cancer back in 2015.
Happy birthday, Bevo.
